publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1913 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Mental Health (Care and Treatment) (Scotland) Act 2003 Modification Order 2004—That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Mental Health (Care and Treatment) (Scotland) Act 2003 Modification Order 2004 be approved. Supported by: Rhona Brankin*

S2M-1913 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Mental Health (Care and Treatment) (Scotland) Act 2003 Modification Order 2004—That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Mental Health (Care and Treatment) (Scotland) Act 2003 Modification Order 2004 be approved. Supported by: Rhona Brankin
S2M-1913 The Draft Mental Health (Care and Treatment) (Scotland) Act 2003 Modification Order 2004 (lodged on 28 October 2004) Ms Sandra White*
